name: distraction
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the state of being very bored or annoyed: His lessons bore me to distraction. That dreadful noise is driving me to distraction.
C1 [ C or U ] something that prevents someone from giving their attention to something else: I can turn the television off if you find it a distraction.
C1 [ C ] an activity that you do for pleasure: one of the distractions of city life
